archimate:Folder.name: Enrich Billing Events
archimate:Folder.documentation:
Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Enrich billing event records with additional data. Extended Description The Enrich Billing Events processes will augment the billing event records by adding data to the records from sources such as customer, product, or other reference data.
A billing event may be assigned a price without consideration of specific product or customer information. The assigned price may be used to enrich the billing event record. Explanatory Reserved for future use. Mandatory Reserved for future use. Optional Reserved for future use. Interactions Reserved for future use.
